usa: Uncle Tom's Cabin: Uncle Tom's Cabin is published
australia: Francis Cadell, in preparation for the launch of his steamer service, explored the Murray River in a canvas boat, travelling 1,300 miles (2,100 km) downstream from Swan Hill.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference">[3]</sup>
argentina: Rosas overthrown by Justo José de Urquiza following Battle of Caseros
